project.title: Investment funds - By type of fund

M..N.TA.L30.A.1.Z5.0000.Z01.E.definition: Investment fund shares/units issued by investment funds other than money market funds, broken down by type of fund: open-end funds (outstanding amounts at the end of the period, total maturity, all currencies combined, denominated in euro, not seasonally adjusted, monthly data)
